title: World of Cruise Ships
creator_contributor_role: Picture Postcard Productions Inc, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Mykonos Island (Greece) - Description and travel
description: Episode of Series "Video visits". The late Stan Delaplane, Pullitzer prize winning travel writer, invites you along for a whirlwind visit to the cruise liners of the world. First, learn the history of cruising and meet some of the great white ladies of the sea. Learn how to select a cruise and discover a variety of ways to make your voyage a success. Travel to the Caribbean, then spend winter in Mazatlan and summer in Ketchikan. Tour the sun-splashed Greek island of Mykonos, continue on to South America's Orinoco and Amazon rivers, then dock at Rio de Janeiro for Carnival. Ride the Delta Queen up the Mississippi, as the calliope toots and a Dixieland band plays. See some of the exotic designs for cruise ships of the future.
